# inputItems

**Instance Property**

The list of input [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExtensionItem] objects associated with the context.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputItems: [Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

If the context has no input items, this array is empty.
title: inputItems
